nodes.text: EVA suits, also known as spacesuits, environment suits, atmospheric suits, vac suits, or g-suits, were pressure suits that enabled wearers to survive and operate in zero gravity space and other dangerous conditions such as poisonous gas or deep ocean water. They provided breathing substance—such as oxygen—and maintained necessary pressure inside the suit. The Resistance pilots Poe Dameron, Iolo Arana, and Karé Kun donned EVA suits during Operation: Sabre Strike.
